umm ... you are right, reviewing the issue, this PR should be fine.

For windows, we are injecting the cmake variables using the configure.bat. For example in sdformat:
```
     -DIGNITION-MATH_INCLUDE_DIRS:STRING="..\..\ign-math\build\install\%build_type%\include\ignition\math"^
     -DIGNITION-MATH_LIBRARY_DIRS:STRING="..\..\ign-math\build\install\%build_type%\lib"^
```
In the ignition math pull request that Steve mentioned we are changing the headers path, so we probably need to modify it.
